nodes.bodyText: It wasnt too hard to find a solution that will work without using {force: true}. We just have to look for it. Can you pls try "mouseleave" trigger if it works.
mouseleave doesn't work but mouseout seems to work for me locally, I pushed it to verify if it passes on pipeline.
Tests passed with the new changes, looks good to me.
Thanks for removing "return" and adding "mouseout" trigger
I thought there was a RTL test added for this initially, now I dont find it. Was it removed?
I was having issues testing tooltip functionality using RTL. Probably related to the CSS visibility properties. I will do research and try to add the test in my next pr.
